products.name: Laneway
products.description: Transform any space in style with the Laneway Vinyl Planks range, the cost-effective and appealing alternative to a timber or carpet installation.

products.name: Pavilion
products.description: Pavilion is a classic collection, this vinyl plank flooring is a practical and durable flooring solution for any space.

products.name: Southern Lights
products.description: Switch from carpet for a home or commercial install with Southern Lights Vinyl Planks in a huge range of quality timber style finishes.

products.name: Stratus
products.description: Stratus is the perfect flooring solution for your busy home. This strong vinyl plan offers longevity and style.

products.name: Visions
products.description: The modern-look alternative to carpet or commercial quality timber, Visions vinyl planks are a budget-friendly upgrade for homes and businesses.

products.name: Harmony grange
products.description: A savvy alternative engineered floating timber floors, Harmony Grange vinyl flooring has the appeal of wood for a fraction of the price.
